mapper.select: SELECT m.*,u.user_name,u.company, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mainboard_prefer mp WHERE mp.mainboard_no=m.mainboard_no), (SELECT k.keyword_name FROM keyword k WHERE m.keyword_no=k.keyword_no) keyword_name FROM mainboard m INNER JOIN user u ON m.user_no=u.user_no ORDER BY m.mainboard_no DESC
SELECT b.* FROM mainboard b LEFT JOIN main_reply r USING(mainboard_no) WHERE mainboard_no=#{mainboardNo}

SELECT b.*, r.main_reply_no, r.contents r_contents, r.hierarchy r_hierarchy, r.group_no r_group_no, r.reply_time r_reply_time, r.user_no r_user_no, r.mainboard_no r_mainboard_no, u.user_name, u.company FROM mainboard b LEFT JOIN user u USING(user_no) LEFT JOIN main_reply r USING(mainboard_no) WHERE mainboard_no=#{mainboardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE mainboard SET mainboard_title=#{mainboardTitle}, mainboard_contents=#{mainboardContents}, mainboard_img=#{mainboardImg}, mainboard_link=#{mainboardLink}, keyword_no=#{keywordNo} WHERE mainboard_no=#{mainboardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT user_name FROM user WHERE mainboard.user_no=user.user_no) user_name, (SELECT company FROM user WHERE user_no=mainboard.user_no) company, (SELECT keyword_name FROM keyword WHERE keyword_no=mainboard.keyword_no) keyword_name FROM mainboard WHERE mainboard_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mainboardTitle},'%')

SELECT *, (SELECT user_name FROM user WHERE mainboard.user_no=user.user_no) user_name, (SELECT company FROM user WHERE user_no=mainboard.user_no) company, (SELECT keyword_name FROM keyword WHERE keyword_no=mainboard.keyword_no) keyword_name FROM mainboard WHERE mainboard_contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mainboardContents},'%')

SELECT *, (SELECT user_name FROM user WHERE user_no=mainboard.user_no) user_name, (SELECT company FROM user WHERE user_no=mainboard.user_no) company, (SELECT keyword_name FROM keyword WHERE keyword_no=mainboard.keyword_no) keyword_name FROM mainboard WHERE user_no IN(SELECT user_no FROM user WHERE user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')) ORDER BY mainboard_no DESC
